articles.title: Teaming up with Al Horford against Celtics will be ‘weird,’ Kristaps Porzingis says
articles.description:
"If somebody said that while we were in Boston, that this would be the scenario, who would believe this?"

The post Teaming up with Al Horford against Celtics will be ‘weird,’ Kristaps Porzingis says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kristaps Porzingis comments on teaming up with Al Horford against the Celtics.
Porzingis reflects on the unexpected nature of this scenario in Boston.
Local fans may experience mixed feelings seeing Horford on the opposing team.

articles.title: Celtics reportedly bring back Dalano Banton on 10-day contract
articles.description:
Banton spent the first half of the 2024 season with the Celtics before being traded to the Blazers.

The post Celtics reportedly bring back Dalano Banton on 10-day contract appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics re-sign Dalano Banton on a 10-day contract as of February 19, 2026.
Banton previously played for the Celtics before a trade to the Blazers this season.
His return may enhance the Celtics' depth as they push for playoff positioning.

articles.title: Here’s why Ed Markey is boycotting the State of the Union — and what he and others are doing instead
articles.description:
The Massachusetts senator will skip President Donald Trump’s address to attend a “People’s State of the Union” rally on the National Mall.

The post Here’s why Ed Markey is boycotting the State of the Union — and what he and others are doing instead appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Senator Ed Markey will boycott Trump's State of the Union on February 19.
Markey will attend a 'People’s State of the Union' rally on the National Mall.
This event highlights local concerns and opposition to current federal policies.
